title: Vivek Ramaswamy, "Woke, Inc.: Inside Corporate America's Social Justice Scam"
description:
Entrepreneur Vivek Ramaswamy argues that corporate America is signing on to "woke culture" only to increase profits. He's interviewed by Greg Mankiw, former Chairman of the President's Council of Economic Advisers during the George W. Bush administration and a Harvard University economics professor.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
